pullRequest.title: Adds null check to prevent a potential crash
pullRequest.bodyText: In some cases .getClassLoader() can return a null value. Even though returning null is very unlikely in this scenario, a null check will ensure stability.

nodes.bodyText: ClassLoader classLoader = getClass().getClassLoader(); is maybe more suitable
do we need this return statement?
Is there any chances that the classloader is null?

commit.message: Adds null check to prevent a potential crash

beforeCommit.message: Adds null check to prevent a potential crash

afterCommit.message: Adds null check to prevent a potential crash
